dict.acceptation: 极大的，巨大的；可怕的，惊人的；极好的；

sent.orig: Either way, the released energy release of energy can cause tremendous tremendous damage.
sent.trans: 每种方式，其释放的能量都能够造成巨大的破坏。

sent.orig: These two companies are. One has tremendous financial strength, while one has tremendous technological.
sent.trans: 这两家公司各有优势，一家财力雄厚，一家技术力量雄厚。

sent.orig: Gates regards fortune of asum as tremendous right, also be tremendous obligation at the same time.
sent.trans: 盖茨把巨额财富看成是巨大的权利，同时也是巨大的义务。

sent.orig: Old cruel: "Yes, cross modern society, marriage also produced tremendous change Marriage also produced tremendous change."
sent.trans: 老酷：“对，不过到了现代社会，婚姻也发生了天翻地覆的变化。”

sent.orig: I'm a great believer in working a tremendous sweat.
sent.trans: 我非常相信运动得出一身汗很有好处。
